roleset.name: move chaotically in a group

example.name: ARG0 subject
example.text: All day long visitors throng the cluster of little stalls at the entrance to the City of God Temple.
example.arg: the cluster of little stalls at the entrance to the City of God Temple

roleset.note: Frame file created by Arrick. Member of Vncls swarm-47.5.1-2. other members include abound, bustle, creep, swarm, teem.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'throng' based on frame for 'swarm'.
